==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|kleidunge}}, from {{m|gmh|kleiden||to clothe}}, from {{m|gmh|kleit}}, from {{der|de|goh|*kleid}}, from {{der|de|gem-pro|*klaiþą||cloth}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈklaɪ̯dʊŋ/}} * {{audio|de|De-Kleidung.ogg|Audio (Germany)}} * {{audio|de|De-at-Kleidung.ogg|Audio (Austria)}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f||Kleidungen}} # {{lb|de|countable}} [[clothing]]; [[apparel]] # {{lb|de|uncountable|rather|_|formal}} [[clothes]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|en}} ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|clothes}} {{l|de|Anziehsachen}} {{i|informal}}; {{l|de|Klamotten}} {{i|informal, colloquial}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|Kleid}} * {{l|de|Bekleidung}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
